ValidationRule.description: requires form tool submissions to have attachments uploaded to all A+ records where Attachment Required = TRUE.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Ready_to_Submit__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Ready_to_Resubmit__c , "Yes")), Number_of_Attachments_Required__c > Number_of_Attachments__c ) && ISPICKVAL ( $Profile.UserType , 'CspLitePortal' ) && !$Permission.BypassVR
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure that all required document attachments are uploaded. Change your answer below to "No" and add all necessary documentation to continue.
